name: PHP automaton
body:
PHP automaton
============
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/jelte/php-automaton.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/jelte/php-automaton)
[![Coverage Status](https://img.shields.io/coveralls/jelte/php-automaton.svg)](https://coveralls.io/r/jelte/php-automaton?branch=master)

Introduction
------------

PHP automaton wsa developed as a stand-alone tool to be included in the composer configuration of your projects.
The main reason for this is that deploy tools evolve and configuration formats change and we wanted a tool that we could keep in sync.

Requirements
------------

PHP automaton is developed for 5.4 and up, no support is offered for earlier version.

Documentation
-------------

Incoming
